titles.title: To provide for the transfer of certain tuna fishing vessels documented in the United States to foreign registry.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E3000)

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee On Merchant Marine.

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from DOT, Commerce.

action.text: Unfavorable Executive Comment Received from Commerce.

bill.summary: 11/20/1993--Introduced. Provides for the transfer of certain tuna fishing vessels documented in the United States to foreign registry.
